Address.label: Address
Address.value: 18500 NORTH ALLIED WAY, PHOENIX, Arizona, 85054, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Republic Services ranks as the second-largest integrated provider of traditional solid waste services in the United States, operating roughly 186 active landfills and more than 200 transfer stations. The company serves residential, commercial, and industrial end markets. It also runs a sizable recycling operation in North America.

value.name: Gregg k. Brummer
value.title: Chief Operating Officer & Executive Vice President
